Package com.taursys.swing

This package contains Mapper's Swing based components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ListSelectionBinder ListSelectionBinder is ...
MDocument MDocument is a Document Implementation which binds to a value in a TextModel
MTable MTable is ...
MTableModel MTableModel is a table model for use with the MTable.
MTextField MTextField is a JTextField which is bound to a TextModel
MTextFieldBeanInfo Title: Mapper Description: Presentation Framework for Web and GUI Applicaitons Copyright: Copyright (c) 2002 Company: Taurus Systems
 

Package com.taursys.swing Description

This package contains Mapper's Swing based components. These components make use of Mapper's models and value holders to bind ValueObjects and Collections to GUI components.

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
